Amrita University Online

Karnataka

4.7 (253 user ratings)
★★★★★ 4.7/5

Study Mode: Distance

Institution Type : Private

About Amrita University Online

Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham is a private university that is multi-disciplinary and research-intensive. It is UGC approved and has been ranked as the 7th Best University in India by the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) in 2022. The University has been awarded A++ Grade by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC).

Amrita Ahead Online is the division of Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham that offers education in an entirely online mode. The same world-class faculty teaches both the online and on-campus learners. This faculty includes professors and mentors from both India and abroad.

The curriculum of the online courses is also similar to the regular courses. The curriculum is industry-aligned and has been designed while keeping in mind the changing times and trends as well as the needs and demands of the industry. The curriculum aims at providing an immersive learning experience to all the online learners.

Apart from an excellent curriculum that includes both academics and mentored industry projects, the university offers industry training certification programs that are relevant to their domain and useful for industry exposure. There are dedicated course mentors to help students through the entire duration of the course.

The university provides full placement assistance to online learners. The university even has its own startup incubator called Amrita TBI which is one of the best in the country where the students can build their own startups

Approvals
  • UGC
  • AICTE
  • NIRF
  • WES
  • NAAC A++
  • Category-1 Autonomy
Amrita University Online Admission Process

There is an online admission process for applying to Amrita Ahead University. With the simple and easy-to-understand admission procedure of the university, you can apply for your preferred course easily. There are direct admissions available & thus, no entrance exam is required to apply for online courses at this university.

The admission procedure for the online courses at Amrita Ahead Online is as follows:

Step 1: Go to the official website of Amrita Ahead Online.

Step 2: Click on “Admissions” in the top right corner and then click on “ONLINE DEGREE.”

Step 3: Now Select the online course you wish to pursue from the drop-down list and proceed to the application form.

Step 4: Fill in the application form with your personal, academic, and professional details.

Step 5: Submit the application form. The university will get back to you via email with your enrollment details if your application is accepted.

The admission procedure for 2024 for the online courses at Amity Online University is as follows:

Step 1: Go to the official website of Amity Online (Note there are separate websites for online and on campus programs).

Step 2: Click on the “Apply Now” tab in the top right corner

Step 3: First fill in your basic personal and academic details followed by your employment details (if any).

Step 4: Now upload all the necessary documents for eligibility proof along with your recent and colored passport-size photo.

Step 5: Submit this application form and pay the application fee. Once your application is reviewed and documents verified, the university will inform you about your enrollment and further procedure via email.

List of Documents
    • Marksheets
    • Residential Proof
    • Proof of Date of Birth
    • Government Issued ID
    • Photocopy of Disability Certificate/ Employment certificate/ Service proof in case of Defense or Paramilitary forces (if applicable)
    • Undertaking by the applicant in case of any pendency (Result awaited/ Reappear/Backlog or any other pendency)
    • Undertaking for Gap Period (if applicable)
    • Two passport size colored photographs
    • Demand Draft (DD) for the prescribed fee

Why Amrita University Online

mrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham has been ranked as the 7th best university in India by NIRF.

The university has been recognized by UGC to offer courses in the online mode.

The university has received the highest level- A++ grade from NAAC.

The learning pedagogy for the online programs at Amrita Ahead Online are innovative and award-winning.

The university provides complete placement assistance to the online learners.

The university has its own startup incubator called Amrita TBI which is one of the best in India.
